metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28594 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the_3MF_Importer::_handle_end_model() functionality of Prusa ResearchPrusaSlicer 2.2.0 and Master (commit 4b040b856). A specially crafted 3MFfile can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious fileto trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
